data.name: Decision: Red Daze Supporter Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Decision: Red Daze Supporter bundle is a compilation of content curated by the developers of Decision: Red Daze!

Here's what you'll find inside:
  • A personal thank-you letter from the developers of the game for your support!
  • A selection of animated avatars for your social media profiles!
  • Exclusive "Evolution of The Game" snippets, featuring everything from early development of the game, such as scrapped ideas, early monster sketches, early ideas for the Dust Bowl, and more!
  • A hand-picked compilation of official Decision: Red Daze screenshots!
  • And more!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
